text:
@DeAnna4Congress Same reason the Florida motorcycle wreck that took the life of a 21 year old was classified as a Covid-19 death. Or the patient in Florida who was counted as new positive cases 16 separate times while in hospital care. The medical industry is political AND THEY LIE!
